Html:
Hi,

Can be done a c# to codedom parser?

hi
Not sure what you mean... c# 3.0 parser - working on it, initial draft will be in the next drop. CodeDom as output - as far as I know, CodeDom model does not cover all language constructs for a language like c#. It has limited purpose - primarily for code serialization of data structures in components, not full code representation
thanks
Roman
